channel.title: Comments on: Issue 041 Author Interview: Kel Purcill and “Luminous”
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Tracey (Carpe Librum)
item.dc:creator: Tracey (Carpe Librum)
item.description: I adored Luminous and learning more about its creation here, thank you so much! Of course now I'm craving shortbread and cherry tart ;-)
